```typescriptreact
import React from 'react';
import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async';

interface SEOProps {
  title?: string;
  description?: string;
  keywords?: string;
  image?: string;
  url?: string;
  type?: string;
  author?: string;
  publishedTime?: string;
  modifiedTime?: string;
  section?: string;
  tags?: string[];
  schema?: object;
}

const SEO: React.FC<SEOProps> = ({
  title = 'deepskilling Learning Platform',
  description = 'Master AI, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, and Full-Stack Development with industry experts. Transform your career with hands-on projects and real-world experience.',
  keywords = 'AI, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, Full Stack Development, Programming, Career Transformation, Online Learning, Tech Skills',
  image = '/og-image.jpg',
  url = 'https://deepskilling.com',
  type = 'website',
  author = 'deepskilling',
  publishedTime,
  modifiedTime,
  section,
  tags = [],
  schema
}) => {
  const siteTitle = 'deepskilling Learning Platform';
  const fullTitle = title === siteTitle ? title : `${title} | ${siteTitle}`;
  const fullUrl = url.startsWith('http') ? url : `https://deepskilling.com${url}`;
  const fullImage = image.startsWith('http') ? image : `https://deepskilling.com${image}`;

  const structuredData = schema || {
    '@context': 'https://schema.org',
    '@type': 'EducationalOrganization',
    name: 'deepskilling',
    description: description,
    url: 'https://deepskilling.com',
    logo: 'https://deepskilling.com/logo.png',
    sameAs: [
      'https://www.linkedin.com/company/deepskilling',
      'https://twitter.com/deepskilling',
      'https://github.com/deepskilling'
    ],
    address: {
      '@type': 'PostalAddress',
      addressCountry: 'US'
    },
    contactPoint: {
      '@type': 'ContactPoint',
      telephone: '+1-555-123-4567',
      contactType: 'customer service',
      email: 'contact@deepskilling.com'
    }
  };

  return (
    <Helmet>
      {/* Basic Meta Tags */}
      <title>{fullTitle}</title>
      <meta name="description" content={description} />
      <meta name="keywords" content={keywords} />
      <meta name="author" content={author} />
      <link rel="canonical" href={fullUrl} />

      {/* Open Graph / Facebook */}
      <meta property="og:type" content={type} />
      <meta property="og:title" content={fullTitle} />
      <meta property="og:description" content={description} />
      <meta property="og:image" content={fullImage} />
      <meta property="og:url" content={fullUrl} />
      <meta property="og:site_name" content="deepskilling Learning Platform" />
      
      {/* Article specific Open Graph tags */}
      {type === 'article' && (
        <>
          {author && <meta property="article:author" content={author} />}
          {publishedTime && <meta property="article:published_time" content={publishedTime} />}
          {modifiedTime && <meta property="article:modified_time" content={modifiedTime} />}
          {section && <meta property="article:section" content={section} />}
          {tags.map((tag, index) => (
            <meta key={index} property="article:tag" content={tag} />
          ))}
        </>
      )}

      {/* Twitter Card */}
      <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
      <meta name="twitter:title" content={fullTitle} />
      <meta name="twitter:description" content={description} />
      <meta name="twitter:image" content={fullImage} />
      <meta name="twitter:site" content="@deepskilling" />
      <meta name="twitter:creator" content="@deepskilling" />

      {/* Additional SEO Tags */}
      <meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-image-preview:large, max-snippet:-1, max-video-preview:-1" />
      <meta name="googlebot" content="index, follow, max-video-preview:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-snippet:-1" />
      
      {/* Mobile and App Tags */}
      <meta name="mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" />
      <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" />
      <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style" content="default" />
      <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-title" content="deepskilling" />

      {/* Structured Data */}
      <script type="application/ld+json">
        {JSON.stringify(structuredData)}
      </script>
    </Helmet>
  );
};

export default SEO;
```

```typescriptreact
                      {post.category}
                    </span>
                    <div className="flex items-center text-gray-500 text-sm">

                  </div>
                  
                  <h3 className="text-lg font-bold mb-3 hover:text-orange-600 transition-colors">
                    <Link to={`/blog/${post.id}`}>{post.title}</Link>
                  </h3>
                  
                  <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4 line-clamp-2">{post.excerpt}</p>
                  
                  <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-4">
                    {post.tags.slice(0, 3).map(tag => (
                      <span key={tag} className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 text-xs rounded">
                        #{tag}
                      </span>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                  
                  <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                      {post.authorAvatar && (
                        <img 
                          src={post.authorAvatar} 
                          alt={post.author}
                          className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full object-cover"
                        />
                      )}
                      <div>
                        <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">{post.author}</p>
                        <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">{new Date(post.publishedAt).toLocaleDateString()}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                      <button
                        onClick={() => handleShare(post)}
                        className="p-2 text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600 transition-colors"
                        title="Share article"
                      >
                        <Share2 className="h-4 w-4" />
                      </button>
                      <Link 
                        to={`/blog/${post.id}`}
                        className="inline-flex items-center text-orange-600 hover:text-orange-700 font-medium text-sm"
                      >
                        Read
                        <ArrowRight className="ml-1 h-4 w-4" />
                      </Link>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </article>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* No Results */}
      {filteredPosts.length === 0 && (
        <section className="py-12">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 text-center">
            <BookOpen className="h-16 w-16 text-gray-400 mx-auto mb-4" />
            <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">No articles found</h3>
            <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">Try adjusting your search terms or filters</p>
            <button
              onClick={() => {
                setSearchTerm('');
                setSelectedCategory('all');
                setSelectedTag('');
              }}
              className="px-6 py-2 bg-orange-500 text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-orange-600 transition-colors"
            >
              Clear Filters
            </button>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default Blog;
```

```typescriptreact
      const matchesLevel = selectedLevel === '' || course.level === selectedLevel;

        (selectedCategory === 'ai-enhanced' && course.category && course.category.includes('-ai')) ||
        (selectedCategory === 'programming' && course.category === 'fullstack');
      
      return matchesSearch && matchesLevel && matchesCategory;
    });

    });

                  </Select>
                </FormControl>
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </CardContent>
        </Card>

            </Box>
          </Box>

            <Card sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 8, mt: 4 }}>

};

export default Courses;
```

```typescriptreact
      return matchesSearch && matchesLevel && matchesCategory;
    });

};

export default Courses;
```

```typescriptreact
        imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555255707-c07966088b7b?w=800'
      }
    ];

    setTimeout(() => {
      setPosts(mockPosts);
      setLoading(false);
    }, 1000);
  }, []);

  const categories = ['all', 'Artificial Intelligence', 'Programming', 'Cloud Computing'];
  const allTags = Array.from(new Set(posts.flatMap(post => post.tags)));

  const filteredPosts = posts.filter(post => {
    const matchesSearch = post.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
                         post.excerpt.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
                         post.tags.some(tag => tag.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()));
    
    const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === 'all' || post.category === selectedCategory;
    const matchesTag = !selectedTag || post.tags.includes(selectedTag);
    
    return matchesSearch && matchesCategory && matchesTag;
  });

  const featuredPosts = filteredPosts.filter(post => post.featured);
  const regularPosts = filteredPosts.filter(post => !post.featured);

  const handleShare = (post: BlogPost) => {
    const url = `${window.location.origin}/blog/${post.id}`;
    
    if ('share' in navigator) {
      (navigator as any).share({
        title: post.title,
        text: post.excerpt,
        url: url,
      }).catch(() => {
        // Fallback - just copy URL to clipboard if possible
        try {
          (navigator as any).clipboard?.writeText(url);
        } catch (e) {
          // Silent fail
        }
      });
    } else {
      // Fallback - just copy URL to clipboard if possible
      try {
        (navigator as any).clipboard?.writeText(url);
      } catch (e) {
        // Silent fail
      }
    }
  };

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-32 w-32 border-b-2" style={{borderColor: '#1a237e'}}></div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      <SEO
        title="Tech Blog - AI, Machine Learning & Career Insights"
        description="Stay updated with the latest in AI, Machine Learning, Cloud Computing, and career transformation. Expert insights, tutorials, and industry trends from deepskilling."
        keywords="AI blog, Machine Learning tutorials, Cloud computing insights, Tech career advice, Programming tips, Data science articles"
        url="/blog"
        schema={{
          '@context': 'https://schema.org',
          '@type': 'Blog',
          name: 'deepskilling Tech Blog',
          description: 'Latest insights in AI, ML, and technology careers',
          url: 'https://deepskilling.com/blog',
          author: {
            '@type': 'Organization',
            name: 'deepskilling'
          }
        }}
      />
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <section className="text-white py-16" style={{background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1a237e 0%, #283593 50%, #3949ab 100%)'}}>
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
          <div className="text-center">
            <h1 className="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-4">
              Tech <span className="text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-400 to-orange-600">Blog</span>
            </h1>

            
            {/* Admin/Teacher Actions */}
            {user && (user.role === 'admin' || user.role === 'teacher') && (
              <div className="mb-6">
                <Link
                  to="/blog-admin"
                  className="inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 bg-white/10 text-white border border-white/30 rounded-lg hover:bg-white/20 transition-all duration-200"
                >
                  <Settings className="h-4 w-4" />
                  Manage Blog
                </Link>
              </div>
            )}
            
            {/* Search Bar */}
            <div className="max-w-2xl mx-auto relative">
              <Search className="absolute left-4 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 h-5 w-5 text-gray-400" />
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Search articles, topics, or tags..."
                value={searchTerm}
                onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
                className="w-full pl-12 pr-4 py-3 rounded-lg border-0 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 text-gray-900"
              />
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Filters */}
      <section className="py-8 bg-white shadow-sm">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
          <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-4 items-center justify-between">
            {/* Categories */}
            <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
              <span className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mr-2">Categories:</span>
              {categories.map(category => (
                <button
                  key={category}
                  onClick={() => setSelectedCategory(category)}
                  className={`px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm font-medium transition-colors ${
                    selectedCategory === category
                      ? 'text-white'
                      : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-200'
                  }`}
                  style={selectedCategory === category ? {backgroundColor: '#1a237e'} : {}}
                >
                  {category === 'all' ? 'All' : category}
                </button>
              ))}
            </div>

            {/* Tags Filter */}
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <Filter className="h-4 w-4 text-gray-500" />
              <select
                value={selectedTag}
                onChange={(e) => setSelectedTag(e.target.value)}
                className="border border-gray-300 rounded-md px-3 py-1 text-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 focus:border-transparent"
              >
                <option value="">All Tags</option>
                {allTags.map(tag => (
                  <option key={tag} value={tag}>{tag}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* Featured Posts */}
      {featuredPosts.length > 0 && (
        <section className="py-12">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-8">
              <TrendingUp className="h-6 w-6 text-orange-500" />
              <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold" style={{color: '#1a237e'}}>Featured Articles</h2>
            </div>
            
            <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
              {featuredPosts.map(post => (
                <article key={post.id} className="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300">
                  {post.imageUrl && (
                    <div className="aspect-video overflow-hidden">
                      <img 
                        src={post.imageUrl} 
                        alt={post.title}
                        className="w-full h-full object-cover hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300"
                      />
                    </div>
                  )}
                  <div className="p-6">
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mb-4">
                      <span className="px-3 py-1 bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 text-xs font-medium rounded-full">
                        {post.category}
                      </span>
                      <div className="flex items-center text-gray-500 text-sm">
                        <Clock className="h-4 w-4 mr-1" />
                        {post.readTime} min read
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <h3 className="text-xl font-bold mb-3 hover:text-orange-600 transition-colors">
                      <Link to={`/blog/${post.id}`}>{post.title}</Link>

                    <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4 line-clamp-3">{post.excerpt}</p>
                    
                    <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                      <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                        {post.authorAvatar && (

      {/* Regular Posts */}
      <section className="py-12">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mb-8">
            <BookOpen className="h-6 w-6" style={{color: '#1a237e'}} />
            <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold" style={{color: '#1a237e'}}>Latest Articles</h2>
          </div>
          
          <div className="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            {regularPosts.map(post => (
              <article key={post.id} className="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300">
                {post.imageUrl && (
                  <div className="aspect-video overflow-hidden">
                    <img 
                      src={post.imageUrl} 
                      alt={post.title}
                      className="w-full h-full object-cover hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300"

                )}
                <div className="p-6">
                  <div className="flex items-center gap-4 mb-4">
                    <span className="px-3 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full" style={{backgroundColor: '#1a237e', color: 'white'}}>
                      {post.category}
                    </span>
                    <div className="flex items-center text-gray-500 text-sm">
                      <Clock className="h-4 w-4 mr-1" />
                      {post.readTime} min read
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  
                  <h3 className="text-lg font-bold mb-3 hover:text-orange-600 transition-colors">
                    <Link to={`/blog/${post.id}`}>{post.title}</Link>
                  </h3>
                  
                  <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4 line-clamp-2">{post.excerpt}</p>
                  
                  <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-4">
                    {post.tags.slice(0, 3).map(tag => (
                      <span key={tag} className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 text-xs rounded">
                        #{tag}
                      </span>
                    ))}
                  </div>
                  
                  <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
                      {post.authorAvatar && (
                        <img 
                          src={post.authorAvatar} 
                          alt={post.author}
                          className="w-6 h-6 rounded-full object-cover"
                        />
                      )}
                      <div>
                        <p className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">{post.author}</p>
                        <p className="text-xs text-gray-500">{new Date(post.publishedAt).toLocaleDateString()}</p>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                      <button
                        onClick={() => handleShare(post)}
                        className="p-2 text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600 transition-colors"
                        title="Share article"
                      >
                        <Share2 className="h-4 w-4" />
                      </button>
                      <Link 
                        to={`/blog/${post.id}`}
                        className="inline-flex items-center text-orange-600 hover:text-orange-700 font-medium text-sm"
                      >
                        Read
                        <ArrowRight className="ml-1 h-4 w-4" />
                      </Link>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </article>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </section>

      {/* No Results */}
      {filteredPosts.length === 0 && (
        <section className="py-12">
          <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 text-center">
            <BookOpen className="h-16 w-16 text-gray-400 mx-auto mb-4" />
            <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">No articles found</h3>
            <p className="text-gray-600 mb-6">Try adjusting your search terms or filters</p>
            <button

            >
              Clear Filters
            </button>
          </div>
        </section>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default Blog;
```

```typescript
import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';

interface SEOOptions {
  title?: string;
  description?: string;
  keywords?: string;
  image?: string;
}

export const useSEO = (options: SEOOptions = {}) => {
  const location = useLocation();

  useEffect(() => {
    // Update document title
    if (options.title) {
      document.title = options.title;
    }

    // Update meta description
    if (options.description) {
      let metaDescription = document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]');
      if (!metaDescription) {
        metaDescription = document.createElement('meta');
        metaDescription.setAttribute('name', 'description');
        document.head.appendChild(metaDescription);
      }
      metaDescription.setAttribute('content', options.description);
    }

    // Update canonical URL
    let canonicalLink = document.querySelector('link[rel="canonical"]');
    if (!canonicalLink) {
      canonicalLink = document.createElement('link');
      canonicalLink.setAttribute('rel', 'canonical');
      document.head.appendChild(canonicalLink);
    }
    canonicalLink.setAttribute('href', `https://deepskilling.com${location.pathname}`);

    // Analytics and tracking (if needed)
    // Track page view for SEO analytics
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('config', 'GA_MEASUREMENT_ID', {
        page_path: location.pathname,
        page_title: options.title
      });
    }
  }, [options, location]);

  return null;
};

// Hook for structured data
export const useStructuredData = (schema: object) => {
  useEffect(() => {
    const script = document.createElement('script');
    script.type = 'application/ld+json';
    script.text = JSON.stringify(schema);
    document.head.appendChild(script);

    return () => {
      document.head.removeChild(script);
    };
  }, [schema]);
};

// Hook for Open Graph data
export const useOpenGraph = (data: {
  title: string;
  description: string;
  image?: string;
  url?: string;
}) => {
  const location = useLocation();

  useEffect(() => {
    const updateMetaTag = (property: string, content: string) => {
      let metaTag = document.querySelector(`meta[property="${property}"]`);
      if (!metaTag) {
        metaTag = document.createElement('meta');
        metaTag.setAttribute('property', property);
        document.head.appendChild(metaTag);
      }
      metaTag.setAttribute('content', content);
    };

    updateMetaTag('og:title', data.title);
    updateMetaTag('og:description', data.description);
    updateMetaTag('og:url', data.url || `https://deepskilling.com${location.pathname}`);
    
    if (data.image) {
      updateMetaTag('og:image', data.image);
    }
  }, [data, location]);
};

declare global {
  interface Window {
    gtag?: (...args: any[]) => void;
  }
}
```

# SEO Implementation Guide

This document outlines the SEO optimizations implemented for the deepskilling React application.

## 🚀 Quick Start

The app is now SEO-ready with the following implementations:

### 1. Dynamic Meta Tags
- **React Helmet Async** for dynamic head management
- Page-specific titles, descriptions, and keywords
- Open Graph and Twitter Card support
- Canonical URLs for all pages

### 2. Structured Data
- Schema.org markup for better search engine understanding
- Organization, Course, Blog, and FAQ schemas
- Rich snippets support

### 3. Performance Optimization
- Bundle analysis tools
- Optimized build scripts
- Lighthouse testing setup

## 📋 Components

### SEO Component (`src/components/SEO.tsx`)
Main SEO component that handles:
- Page titles
- Meta descriptions
- Keywords
- Open Graph tags
- Twitter Card tags
- Structured data injection

**Usage:**

```typescriptreact
import React from 'react';
import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async';

interface GoogleAnalyticsProps {
  measurementId?: string;
  debugMode?: boolean;
}

const GoogleAnalytics: React.FC<GoogleAnalyticsProps> = ({ 
  measurementId = process.env.REACT_APP_GA_MEASUREMENT_ID || 'G-XXXXXXXXXX',
  debugMode = process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development'
}) => {
  // Don't load analytics in development unless explicitly enabled
  if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' && !debugMode) {
    return null;
  }

  return (
    <Helmet>
      {/* Google Analytics 4 */}
      <script async src={`https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=${measurementId}`} />
      <script>
        {`
          window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
          function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
          gtag('js', new Date());
          
          gtag('config', '${measurementId}', {
            page_title: document.title,
            page_location: window.location.href,
            send_page_view: true,
            // Enhanced measurement
            enhanced_measurement: {
              scrolls: true,
              outbound_clicks: true,
              site_search: true,
              video_engagement: true,
              file_downloads: true
            },
            // Custom dimensions for education tracking
            custom_map: {
              'custom_parameter_1': 'user_role',
              'custom_parameter_2': 'course_category',
              'custom_parameter_3': 'enrollment_status'
            }
          });
          
          // Track custom events for educational platform
          gtag('event', 'page_view', {
            page_title: document.title,
            page_location: window.location.href,
            content_group1: 'Educational Content'
          });
        `}
      </script>

      {/* Google Search Console verification */}
      <meta name="google-site-verification" content="YOUR_VERIFICATION_CODE_HERE" />
      
      {/* Additional Google services */}
      <meta name="google" content="notranslate" />
      <meta name="google" content="nositelinkssearchbox" />
    </Helmet>
  );
};

export default GoogleAnalytics;
```

```typescript
// Google Analytics 4 Event Tracking Utilities

export interface GAEvent {
  action: string;
  category: string;
  label?: string;
  value?: number;
  custom_parameters?: Record<string, any>;
}

// Declare gtag function for TypeScript
declare global {
  interface Window {
    gtag: (...args: any[]) => void;
    dataLayer: any[];
  }
}

// Track page views
export const trackPageView = (path: string, title: string) => {
  if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.gtag) {
    window.gtag('config', process.env.REACT_APP_GA_MEASUREMENT_ID, {
      page_path: path,
      page_title: title,
    });
  }
};

// Track custom events
export const trackEvent = ({ action, category, label, value, custom_parameters }: GAEvent) => {
  if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.gtag) {
    window.gtag('event', action, {
      event_category: category,
      event_label: label,
      value: value,
      ...custom_parameters,
    });
  }
};

// Educational Platform Specific Events
export const trackCourseView = (courseId: number, courseName: string, category: string) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'view_course',
    category: 'Course Interaction',
    label: courseName,
    custom_parameters: {
      course_id: courseId,
      course_category: category,
      content_type: 'course'
    }
  });
};

export const trackEnrollment = (courseId: number, courseName: string, price: number) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'enrollment_start',
    category: 'Course Conversion',
    label: courseName,
    value: price,
    custom_parameters: {
      course_id: courseId,
      course_name: courseName,
      course_price: price,
      conversion_type: 'enrollment'
    }
  });
};

export const trackBlogRead = (postId: string, title: string, category: string) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'read_blog_post',
    category: 'Content Engagement',
    label: title,
    custom_parameters: {
      post_id: postId,
      post_category: category,
      content_type: 'blog_post'
    }
  });
};

export const trackSearch = (searchTerm: string, resultCount: number) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'search',
    category: 'Site Search',
    label: searchTerm,
    custom_parameters: {
      search_term: searchTerm,
      result_count: resultCount
    }
  });
};

export const trackCareerPathView = (pathName: string) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'view_career_path',
    category: 'Career Planning',
    label: pathName,
    custom_parameters: {
      career_path: pathName,
      content_type: 'career_guidance'
    }
  });
};

export const trackDownload = (fileName: string, fileType: string) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'file_download',
    category: 'Resource Access',
    label: fileName,
    custom_parameters: {
      file_name: fileName,
      file_type: fileType
    }
  });
};

export const trackVideoPlay = (videoTitle: string, duration: number) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'video_play',
    category: 'Video Engagement',
    label: videoTitle,
    custom_parameters: {
      video_title: videoTitle,
      video_duration: duration,
      content_type: 'video'
    }
  });
};

// Performance monitoring
export const trackPerformance = (metricName: string, value: number) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'performance_metric',
    category: 'Site Performance',
    label: metricName,
    value: Math.round(value),
    custom_parameters: {
      metric_name: metricName,
      metric_value: value
    }
  });
};

// Core Web Vitals tracking
export const trackWebVitals = () => {
  if (typeof window !== 'undefined') {
    import('web-vitals').then(({ getCLS, getFID, getFCP, getLCP, getTTFB }) => {
      getCLS((metric) => trackPerformance('CLS', metric.value));
      getFID((metric) => trackPerformance('FID', metric.value));
      getFCP((metric) => trackPerformance('FCP', metric.value));
      getLCP((metric) => trackPerformance('LCP', metric.value));
      getTTFB((metric) => trackPerformance('TTFB', metric.value));
    });
  }
};

// Search Console integration utilities
export const generateSearchConsoleParams = () => {
  const currentUrl = window.location.href;
  const params = new URLSearchParams();
  params.set('url', currentUrl);
  params.set('utm_source', 'search_console');
  params.set('utm_medium', 'organic');
  return params.toString();
};

// Helper to track user journey
export const trackUserJourney = (step: string, category: string = 'User Journey') => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'journey_step',
    category: category,
    label: step,
    custom_parameters: {
      journey_step: step,
      timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
    }
  });
};
```

```typescriptreact
const ProtectedRoute: React.FC<{ children: React.ReactNode; requiredRole?: string; allowedRoles?: string[] }> = ({ 
  children, 
  requiredRole,
  allowedRoles
}) => {
  const { user, loading } = useAuth();

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-32 w-32 border-b-2 border-primary-600"></div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (!user) {
    return <Navigate to="/login" replace />;
  }

  if (requiredRole && user.role !== requiredRole) {
    return <Navigate to="/dashboard" replace />;
  }

  if (allowedRoles && !allowedRoles.includes(user.role)) {
    return <Navigate to="/dashboard" replace />;
  }

  return <>{children}</>;
};
```

```typescriptreact
const ProtectedRoute: React.FC<{ children: React.ReactNode; requiredRole?: string; allowedRoles?: string[] }> = ({ 
  children, 
  requiredRole,
  allowedRoles
}) => {
  const { user, loading } = useAuth();

  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-32 w-32 border-b-2 border-primary-600"></div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  if (!user) {
    return <Navigate to="/login" replace />;
  }

  if (requiredRole && user.role !== requiredRole) {
    return <Navigate to="/dashboard" replace />;
  }

  if (allowedRoles && !allowedRoles.includes(user.role)) {
    return <Navigate to="/dashboard" replace />;
  }

  return <>{children}</>;
};
```

```typescript
export const getRandomKeywords = (category: keyof typeof PRIMARY_KEYWORDS, count: number = 5): string[] => {
  const keywords = PRIMARY_KEYWORDS[category];
  return keywords.sort(() => 0.5 - Math.random()).slice(0, count);
};

export const getCourseKeywords = (courseTitle: string): string[] => {
  const title = courseTitle.toLowerCase();
  let keywords: string[] = [];
  
  if (title.includes('chatgpt')) {
    keywords = [...keywords, ...COURSE_SPECIFIC_KEYWORDS.CHATGPT];
  }
  if (title.includes('ai') || title.includes('artificial intelligence')) {
    keywords = [...keywords, ...PRIMARY_KEYWORDS.AI_ML.slice(0, 8)];
  }
  if (title.includes('cloud') || title.includes('aws') || title.includes('azure')) {
    keywords = [...keywords, ...PRIMARY_KEYWORDS.CLOUD.slice(0, 8)];
  }
  if (title.includes('full stack') || title.includes('programming')) {
    keywords = [...keywords, ...PRIMARY_KEYWORDS.PROGRAMMING.slice(0, 8)];
  }
  
  return [...new Set(keywords)]; // Remove duplicates
};
```

```typescriptreact
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { ChevronDown, ChevronUp } from 'lucide-react';
import { generateFAQSchema } from '../utils/seo';
import JsonLd from './JsonLd';

interface FAQItem {
  id: string;
  question: string;
  answer: string;
  keywords?: string[];
}

interface FAQProps {
  faqs: FAQItem[];
  title?: string;
  category?: string;
}

const FAQ: React.FC<FAQProps> = ({ 
  faqs, 
  title = "Frequently Asked Questions",
  category = "general" 
}) => {
  const [openItems, setOpenItems] = useState<string[]>([]);

  const toggleItem = (id: string) => {
    setOpenItems(prev => 
      prev.includes(id) 
        ? prev.filter(item => item !== id)
        : [...prev, id]
    );
  };

  const faqSchema = generateFAQSchema(faqs.map(faq => ({
    question: faq.question,
    answer: faq.answer
  })));

  return (
    <section className="py-16 bg-white" aria-labelledby="faq-heading">
      <JsonLd data={faqSchema} />
      
      <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
        <div className="text-center mb-12">
          <h2 id="faq-heading" className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">
            {title}
          </h2>
          <p className="text-lg text-gray-600">
            Get answers to the most common questions about our courses and platform
          </p>
        </div>

        <div className="space-y-4">
          {faqs.map((faq) => {
            const isOpen = openItems.includes(faq.id);
            
            return (
              <div
                key={faq.id}
                className="border border-gray-200 rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200"
              >
                <button
                  onClick={() => toggleItem(faq.id)}
                  className="w-full px-6 py-4 text-left bg-gray-50 hover:bg-gray-100 transition-colors duration-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-inset"
                  aria-expanded={isOpen}
                  aria-controls={`faq-answer-${faq.id}`}
                >
                  <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
                    <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 pr-4">
                      {faq.question}
                    </h3>
                    <div className="flex-shrink-0">
                      {isOpen ? (
                        <ChevronUp className="h-5 w-5 text-gray-500" />
                      ) : (
                        <ChevronDown className="h-5 w-5 text-gray-500" />
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </button>
                
                {isOpen && (
                  <div
                    id={`faq-answer-${faq.id}`}
                    className="px-6 py-4 bg-white border-t border-gray-100"
                    role="region"
                    aria-labelledby={`faq-question-${faq.id}`}
                  >
                    <div className="prose prose-gray max-w-none">
                      <p className="text-gray-700 leading-relaxed">
                        {faq.answer}
                      </p>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                )}
              </div>
            );
          })}
        </div>

        {/* Call to Action */}
        <div className="mt-12 text-center">
          <div className="bg-blue-50 rounded-xl px-8 py-6">
            <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2">
              Still have questions?
            </h3>
            <p className="text-gray-600 mb-4">
              Our team is here to help you choose the right course for your career goals
            </p>
            <a
              href="/contact"
              className="inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 bg-blue-600 text-white font-medium rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors duration-200"
            >
              Contact Us
            </a>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
  );
};

export default FAQ;
```

```typescriptreact
    if (scrollContainerAIRef.current) {
      const { scrollLeft, scrollWidth, clientWidth } = scrollContainerAIRef.current;
      setCanScrollLeftAI(scrollLeft > 0);
      setCanScrollRightAI(scrollLeft < scrollWidth - clientWidth);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
```

```typescriptreact
      setCanScrollLeftAI(scrollLeft > 0);
      setCanScrollRightAI(scrollLeft < scrollWidth - clientWidth);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    const fetchFeaturedCourses = async () => {
      try {
        // Set sample data immediately to ensure courses display
        setFeaturedCourses(allCourses);
        setLoading(false);
        
        // Try to fetch from API in the background
        const courses = await courseService.getCourses({ featured: true, limit: 12 });
        if (courses && courses.length > 0) {
          setFeaturedCourses(courses);
        }
      } catch (error) {
        // Ensure sample data is set even if API fails
        setFeaturedCourses(allCourses);
        setLoading(false);
      }
    };

    fetchFeaturedCourses();
  }, []);

  // Initialize scroll buttons
  useEffect(() => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      updateScrollButtons();
      updateScrollButtonsAI();
    }, 100);
  }, []);

    }, 100);
  }, [activeTab]);

    const containerAI = scrollContainerAIRef.current;

      container.addEventListener('scroll', updateScrollButtons);
    }

      containerAI.addEventListener('scroll', updateScrollButtonsAI);
    }
    
    return () => {
      if (container) {
        container.removeEventListener('scroll', updateScrollButtons);
      }
      if (containerAI) {
        containerAI.removeEventListener('scroll', updateScrollButtonsAI);
      }
    };
  }, []);
```

```typescriptreact
      return matchesSearch && matchesLevel && matchesCategory;
```

```typescriptreact
        (selectedCategory === 'programming' && course.category === 'fullstack');
      
      return matchesSearch && matchesLevel && matchesCategory;
    });
```

```typescript
// Performance monitoring utilities for SEO and user experience

export interface PerformanceMetrics {
  lcp: number; // Largest Contentful Paint
  fid: number; // First Input Delay
  cls: number; // Cumulative Layout Shift
  fcp: number; // First Contentful Paint
  ttfb: number; // Time to First Byte
}

export interface PageLoadMetrics {
  loadTime: number;
  domContentLoaded: number;
  firstPaint: number;
  firstContentfulPaint: number;
}

// Core Web Vitals thresholds
export const PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS = {
  LCP: {
    GOOD: 2500, // ms
    POOR: 4000
  },
  FID: {
    GOOD: 100, // ms
    POOR: 300
  },
  CLS: {
    GOOD: 0.1,
    POOR: 0.25
  },
  FCP: {
    GOOD: 1800, // ms
    POOR: 3000
  },
  TTFB: {
    GOOD: 800, // ms
    POOR: 1800
  }
};

// Monitor page load performance
export const measurePageLoad = (): Promise<PageLoadMetrics> => {
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    if (typeof window === 'undefined') {
      resolve({
        loadTime: 0,
        domContentLoaded: 0,
        firstPaint: 0,
        firstContentfulPaint: 0
      });
      return;
    }

    const observer = new PerformanceObserver((list) => {
      const entries = list.getEntries();
      const navigation = performance.getEntriesByType('navigation')[0] as PerformanceNavigationTiming;
      
      let firstPaint = 0;
      let firstContentfulPaint = 0;

      entries.forEach((entry) => {
        if (entry.name === 'first-paint') {
          firstPaint = entry.startTime;
        }
        if (entry.name === 'first-contentful-paint') {
          firstContentfulPaint = entry.startTime;
        }
      });

      resolve({
        loadTime: navigation.loadEventEnd - navigation.loadEventStart,
        domContentLoaded: navigation.domContentLoadedEventEnd - navigation.domContentLoadedEventStart,
        firstPaint,
        firstContentfulPaint
      });

      observer.disconnect();
    });

    observer.observe({ entryTypes: ['paint', 'navigation'] });
  });
};

// Monitor resource loading
export const measureResourceLoading = () => {
  if (typeof window === 'undefined') return;

  const resources = performance.getEntriesByType('resource');
  const slowResources = resources.filter((resource: any) => resource.duration > 1000);
  
  if (slowResources.length > 0) {
    console.warn('Slow loading resources detected:', slowResources);
    
    // Send to analytics
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('event', 'slow_resources', {
        event_category: 'Performance',
        event_label: 'Resource Loading',
        value: slowResources.length
      });
    }
  }
};

// Monitor JavaScript errors
export const setupErrorTracking = () => {
  if (typeof window === 'undefined') return;

  window.addEventListener('error', (event) => {
    console.error('JavaScript Error:', event.error);
    
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('event', 'javascript_error', {
        event_category: 'Error',
        event_label: event.error?.message || 'Unknown error',
        value: 1
      });
    }
  });

  window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', (event) => {
    console.error('Unhandled Promise Rejection:', event.reason);
    
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('event', 'promise_rejection', {
        event_category: 'Error',
        event_label: event.reason?.message || 'Unknown promise rejection',
        value: 1
      });
    }
  });
};

// Monitor user engagement
export const trackUserEngagement = () => {
  if (typeof window === 'undefined') return;

  let startTime = Date.now();
  let isActive = true;

  const trackEngagement = () => {
    if (isActive) {
      const timeSpent = Date.now() - startTime;
      
      if (window.gtag && timeSpent > 5000) { // Only track if user spent more than 5 seconds
        window.gtag('event', 'page_engagement', {
          event_category: 'Engagement',
          event_label: window.location.pathname,
          value: Math.round(timeSpent / 1000) // Convert to seconds
        });
      }
    }
  };

  // Track when user becomes inactive
  const handleVisibilityChange = () => {
    if (document.hidden) {
      isActive = false;
      trackEngagement();
    } else {
      isActive = true;
      startTime = Date.now();
    }
  };

  // Track when user leaves the page
  const handleBeforeUnload = () => {
    trackEngagement();
  };

  document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', handleVisibilityChange);
  window.addEventListener('beforeunload', handleBeforeUnload);

  return () => {
    document.removeEventListener('visibilitychange', handleVisibilityChange);
    window.removeEventListener('beforeunload', handleBeforeUnload);
  };
};

// Generate performance report
export const generatePerformanceReport = async (): Promise<{
  score: number;
  metrics: Partial<PerformanceMetrics>;
  recommendations: string[];
}> => {
  const metrics: Partial<PerformanceMetrics> = {};
  const recommendations: string[] = [];
  let score = 100;

  try {
    // Get Core Web Vitals using web-vitals library
    const webVitals = await import('web-vitals');
    
    return new Promise((resolve) => {
      let metricsCollected = 0;
      const totalMetrics = 5;

      const checkComplete = () => {
        metricsCollected++;
        if (metricsCollected === totalMetrics) {
          // Calculate score based on metrics
          if (metrics.lcp && metrics.lcp > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.LCP.POOR) {
            score -= 20;
            recommendations.push('Optimize Largest Contentful Paint - consider image optimization and server response times');
          }
          if (metrics.fid && metrics.fid > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.FID.POOR) {
            score -= 20;
            recommendations.push('Improve First Input Delay - reduce JavaScript execution time');
          }
          if (metrics.cls && metrics.cls > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.CLS.POOR) {
            score -= 20;
            recommendations.push('Reduce Cumulative Layout Shift - ensure elements have defined dimensions');
          }

          resolve({ score, metrics, recommendations });
        }
      };

      webVitals.getCLS((metric) => {
        metrics.cls = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
      
      webVitals.getFID((metric) => {
        metrics.fid = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
      
      webVitals.getFCP((metric) => {
        metrics.fcp = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
      
      webVitals.getLCP((metric) => {
        metrics.lcp = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
      
      webVitals.getTTFB((metric) => {
        metrics.ttfb = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Failed to generate performance report:', error);
    return { score: 0, metrics: {}, recommendations: ['Performance monitoring is not available'] };
  }
};

// SEO performance monitoring
export const monitorSEOPerformance = () => {
  if (typeof window === 'undefined') return;

  // Check if meta tags are present
  const title = document.querySelector('title')?.textContent;
  const description = document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]')?.getAttribute('content');
  const keywords = document.querySelector('meta[name="keywords"]')?.getAttribute('content');
  
  const seoIssues = [];
  
  if (!title || title.length < 30) {
    seoIssues.push('Page title is missing or too short');
  }
  if (!description || description.length < 120) {
    seoIssues.push('Meta description is missing or too short');
  }
  if (!keywords) {
    seoIssues.push('Meta keywords are missing');
  }

  if (seoIssues.length > 0 && window.gtag) {
    window.gtag('event', 'seo_issues', {
      event_category: 'SEO',
      event_label: seoIssues.join(', '),
      value: seoIssues.length
    });
  }

  return {
    title,
    description,
    keywords,
    issues: seoIssues
  };
};
```

```typescriptreact
import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';
import { 
  measurePageLoad, 
  measureResourceLoading, 
  setupErrorTracking, 
  trackUserEngagement,
  monitorSEOPerformance 
} from '../utils/performanceMonitoring';
import { trackPageView, trackPerformance } from '../utils/analytics';

const PerformanceMonitor: React.FC = () => {
  const location = useLocation();

  useEffect(() => {
    // Track page view
    trackPageView(location.pathname, document.title);

    // Monitor page performance
    measurePageLoad().then((metrics) => {
      // Track performance metrics
      if (metrics.loadTime > 0) {
        trackPerformance('page_load_time', metrics.loadTime);
      }
      if (metrics.firstContentfulPaint > 0) {
        trackPerformance('first_contentful_paint', metrics.firstContentfulPaint);
      }
    });

    // Monitor resource loading
    setTimeout(() => {
      measureResourceLoading();
    }, 1000);

    // Monitor SEO elements
    const seoData = monitorSEOPerformance();
    if (seoData.issues.length > 0) {
      console.warn('SEO Issues detected:', seoData.issues);
    }

  }, [location]);

  useEffect(() => {
    // Set up error tracking once
    setupErrorTracking();

    // Set up engagement tracking
    const cleanup = trackUserEngagement();

    return cleanup;
  }, []);

  return null; // This component doesn't render anything
};

export default PerformanceMonitor;
```

# 🚀 Google Search Console & Analytics Setup Guide

## 📊 Implementation Status: ✅ COMPLETE

Your deepskilling React app now includes comprehensive performance monitoring and Google Search Console integration.

## 🔧 Setup Instructions

### 1. Google Search Console Setup

#### Step 1: Create Google Search Console Property
1. Go to [Google Search Console](https://search.google.com/search-console)
2. Click "Add Property"
3. Choose "URL prefix" and enter: `https://deepskilling.com`
4. Click "Continue"

#### Step 2: Verify Ownership
**Method 1: HTML File Upload (Recommended)**
1. Download the verification HTML file from Google
2. Replace `frontend/public/google-site-verification.html` with the downloaded file
3. Deploy to production
4. Click "Verify" in Search Console

**Method 2: Meta Tag Verification**
1. Copy the verification code from Google Search Console
2. Update `frontend/src/components/GoogleAnalytics.tsx`:
   ```tsx
   <meta name="google-site-verification" content="YOUR_VERIFICATION_CODE_HERE" />
   ```
3. Replace `YOUR_VERIFICATION_CODE_HERE` with your actual code
4. Deploy and verify

### 2. Google Analytics 4 Setup

#### Step 1: Create GA4 Property
1. Go to [Google Analytics](https://analytics.google.com)
2. Create a new GA4 property for your website
3. Copy your Measurement ID (format: G-XXXXXXXXXX)

#### Step 2: Configure Environment Variables
1. Copy `frontend/.env.example` to `frontend/.env`:
   ```bash
   cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env
   ```

2. Update the variables in `frontend/.env`:
   ```env
   REACT_APP_GA_MEASUREMENT_ID=G-XXXXXXXXXX
   REACT_APP_GOOGLE_SITE_VERIFICATION=your-verification-code
   REACT_APP_SITE_URL=https://deepskilling.com
   ```

### 3. Production Deployment

#### Update URLs for Production
1. Replace all instances of `https://deepskilling.com` with your actual domain
2. Update the following files:
   - `frontend/public/sitemap.xml`
   - `frontend/src/utils/seo.ts`
   - `frontend/src/components/SEO.tsx`

#### Deploy to Production

```shellscript
#!/bin/bash

# Google Analytics and Search Console Setup Script
# Run this script to configure your analytics setup

echo "🚀 Setting up Google Analytics and Search Console for deepskilling..."

# Check if .env file exists
if [ ! -f ".env" ]; then
    echo "📄 Creating .env file from template..."
    cp .env.example .env
    echo "✅ .env file created"
else
    echo "⚠️  .env file already exists, skipping creation"
fi

# Prompt for Google Analytics Measurement ID
echo ""
echo "📊 Please provide your Google Analytics configuration:"
echo "ℹ️  Get your Measurement ID from: https://analytics.google.com"
read -p "Enter your GA4 Measurement ID (e.g., G-XXXXXXXXXX): " GA_ID

if [ ! -z "$GA_ID" ]; then
    # Update .env file with GA measurement ID
    if grep -q "REACT_APP_GA_MEASUREMENT_ID" .env; then
        sed -i.bak "s/REACT_APP_GA_MEASUREMENT_ID=.*/REACT_APP_GA_MEASUREMENT_ID=$GA_ID/" .env
    else
        echo "REACT_APP_GA_MEASUREMENT_ID=$GA_ID" >> .env
    fi
    echo "✅ Google Analytics Measurement ID configured"
fi

# Prompt for Search Console verification
echo ""
echo "🔍 Google Search Console setup:"
echo "ℹ️  Get verification code from: https://search.google.com/search-console"
read -p "Enter your Search Console verification code (optional): " VERIFICATION_CODE

if [ ! -z "$VERIFICATION_CODE" ]; then
    # Update .env file with verification code
    if grep -q "REACT_APP_GOOGLE_SITE_VERIFICATION" .env; then
        sed -i.bak "s/REACT_APP_GOOGLE_SITE_VERIFICATION=.*/REACT_APP_GOOGLE_SITE_VERIFICATION=$VERIFICATION_CODE/" .env
    else
        echo "REACT_APP_GOOGLE_SITE_VERIFICATION=$VERIFICATION_CODE" >> .env
    fi
    echo "✅ Google Search Console verification configured"
fi

# Prompt for production site URL
echo ""
read -p "Enter your production site URL (e.g., https://deepskilling.com): " SITE_URL

if [ ! -z "$SITE_URL" ]; then
    # Update .env file with site URL
    if grep -q "REACT_APP_SITE_URL" .env; then
        sed -i.bak "s|REACT_APP_SITE_URL=.*|REACT_APP_SITE_URL=$SITE_URL|" .env
    else
        echo "REACT_APP_SITE_URL=$SITE_URL" >> .env
    fi
    echo "✅ Site URL configured"
    
    # Update sitemap.xml with the new URL
    if [ -f "public/sitemap.xml" ]; then
        echo "🗺️  Updating sitemap.xml with your domain..."
        sed -i.bak "s|https://deepskilling.com|$SITE_URL|g" public/sitemap.xml
        echo "✅ Sitemap updated"
    fi
fi

# Enable performance monitoring in production
if grep -q "REACT_APP_ENABLE_PERFORMANCE_MONITORING" .env; then
    sed -i.bak "s/REACT_APP_ENABLE_PERFORMANCE_MONITORING=.*/REACT_APP_ENABLE_PERFORMANCE_MONITORING=true/" .env
else
    echo "REACT_APP_ENABLE_PERFORMANCE_MONITORING=true" >> .env
fi

# Clean up backup files
rm -f .env.bak public/sitemap.xml.bak 2>/dev/null

echo ""
echo "🎉 Analytics setup complete!"
echo ""
echo "📋 Next steps:"
echo "1. 🔍 Verify your Google Search Console property"
echo "2. 📊 Check Google Analytics is receiving data"  
echo "3. 🚀 Deploy to production"
echo "4. ⚡ Run 'npm run lighthouse' to check performance"
echo ""
echo "📄 Current .env configuration:"
cat .env
echo ""
echo "🔧 Additional setup commands:"
echo "   npm run build:analyze  # Analyze bundle size"
echo "   npm run lighthouse     # Performance audit"
echo "   npm run seo:validate   # SEO validation"
echo ""
echo "✅ Ready for production deployment!"
```

```typescript
// Google Analytics 4 Event Tracking Utilities

export interface GAEvent {
  action: string;
  category: string;
  label?: string;
  value?: number;
  custom_parameters?: Record<string, any>;
}

// Declare gtag function for TypeScript
declare global {
  interface Window {
    gtag?: (...args: any[]) => void;
    dataLayer?: any[];
  }
}

// Track page views
export const trackPageView = (path: string, title: string) => {
  if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.gtag) {
    window.gtag('config', process.env.REACT_APP_GA_MEASUREMENT_ID, {
      page_path: path,
      page_title: title,
    });
  }
};

// Track custom events
export const trackEvent = ({ action, category, label, value, custom_parameters }: GAEvent) => {
  if (typeof window !== 'undefined' && window.gtag) {
    window.gtag('event', action, {
      event_category: category,
      event_label: label,
      value: value,
      ...custom_parameters,
    });
  }
};

// Educational Platform Specific Events
export const trackCourseView = (courseId: number, courseName: string, category: string) => {
  trackEvent({
    action: 'view_course',
    category: 'Course Interaction',

      course_id: courseId,
      course_category: category,
      content_type: 'course'
    }

};

// Performance monitoring

export const trackWebVitals = () => {

    import('web-vitals').then(({ getCLS, getFID, getFCP, getLCP, getTTFB }) => {
      getCLS((metric) => trackPerformance('CLS', metric.value));

  params.set('utm_medium', 'organic');

};

      journey_step: step,
      timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
    }
  });
};
```

```typescript
import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';

interface SEOOptions {
  title?: string;
  description?: string;
  keywords?: string;
  image?: string;
}

export const useSEO = (options: SEOOptions = {}) => {
  const location = useLocation();

  useEffect(() => {
    // Update document title
    if (options.title) {
      document.title = options.title;
    }

    // Update meta description
    if (options.description) {
      let metaDescription = document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]');
      if (!metaDescription) {
        metaDescription = document.createElement('meta');
        metaDescription.setAttribute('name', 'description');
        document.head.appendChild(metaDescription);
      }
      metaDescription.setAttribute('content', options.description);
    }

    // Update canonical URL
    let canonicalLink = document.querySelector('link[rel="canonical"]');
    if (!canonicalLink) {
      canonicalLink = document.createElement('link');
      canonicalLink.setAttribute('rel', 'canonical');
      document.head.appendChild(canonicalLink);
    }
    canonicalLink.setAttribute('href', `https://deepskilling.com${location.pathname}`);

    // Analytics and tracking (if needed)
    // Track page view for SEO analytics
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('config', 'GA_MEASUREMENT_ID', {
        page_path: location.pathname,
        page_title: options.title
      });
    }
  }, [options, location]);

  return null;
};

// Hook for structured data
export const useStructuredData = (schema: object) => {
  useEffect(() => {
    const script = document.createElement('script');
    script.type = 'application/ld+json';
    script.text = JSON.stringify(schema);
    document.head.appendChild(script);

    return () => {
      document.head.removeChild(script);
    };
  }, [schema]);
};

// Hook for Open Graph data
export const useOpenGraph = (data: {
  title: string;
  description: string;
  image?: string;
  url?: string;
}) => {
  const location = useLocation();

  useEffect(() => {
    const updateMetaTag = (property: string, content: string) => {
      let metaTag = document.querySelector(`meta[property="${property}"]`);
      if (!metaTag) {
        metaTag = document.createElement('meta');
        metaTag.setAttribute('property', property);
        document.head.appendChild(metaTag);
      }
      metaTag.setAttribute('content', content);
    };

    updateMetaTag('og:title', data.title);
    updateMetaTag('og:description', data.description);
    updateMetaTag('og:url', data.url || `https://deepskilling.com${location.pathname}`);
    
    if (data.image) {
      updateMetaTag('og:image', data.image);
    }
  }, [data, location]);
};

// Global gtag declaration is handled in analytics.ts
```

```typescript
  PRIMARY: 2, // 2% density for primary keywords
  SECONDARY: 1, // 1% density for secondary keywords
  LONG_TAIL: 0.5 // 0.5% density for long-tail keywords
};

// Helper functions
export const getRandomKeywords = (category: keyof typeof PRIMARY_KEYWORDS, count: number = 5): string[] => {
  const keywords = PRIMARY_KEYWORDS[category];
  return keywords.sort(() => 0.5 - Math.random()).slice(0, count);
};

export const getCourseKeywords = (courseTitle: string): string[] => {
  const title = courseTitle.toLowerCase();
  let keywords: string[] = [];
  
  if (title.includes('chatgpt')) {
    keywords = [...keywords, ...COURSE_SPECIFIC_KEYWORDS.CHATGPT];
  }
  if (title.includes('ai') || title.includes('artificial intelligence')) {
    keywords = [...keywords, ...PRIMARY_KEYWORDS.AI_ML.slice(0, 8)];
  }
  if (title.includes('cloud') || title.includes('aws') || title.includes('azure')) {
    keywords = [...keywords, ...PRIMARY_KEYWORDS.CLOUD.slice(0, 8)];
  }
  if (title.includes('full stack') || title.includes('programming')) {
    keywords = [...keywords, ...PRIMARY_KEYWORDS.PROGRAMMING.slice(0, 8)];
  }
  
  return Array.from(new Set(keywords)); // Remove duplicates
};
```

```typescriptreact
import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';
import { 
  measurePageLoad, 
  measureResourceLoading, 
  setupErrorTracking, 
  trackUserEngagement,
  monitorSEOPerformance 
} from '../utils/performanceMonitoring';
import { trackPageView, trackPerformance } from '../utils/analytics';

const PerformanceMonitor: React.FC = () => {
  const location = useLocation();

  useEffect(() => {
    // Track page view
    trackPageView(location.pathname, document.title);

    // Monitor page performance
    measurePageLoad().then((metrics) => {
      // Track performance metrics
      if (metrics.loadTime > 0) {
        trackPerformance('page_load_time', metrics.loadTime);
      }
      if (metrics.firstContentfulPaint > 0) {
        trackPerformance('first_contentful_paint', metrics.firstContentfulPaint);
      }
    });

    // Monitor resource loading
    setTimeout(() => {
      measureResourceLoading();
    }, 1000);

    // Monitor SEO elements
    const seoData = monitorSEOPerformance();
    if (seoData && seoData.issues && seoData.issues.length > 0) {
      console.warn('SEO Issues detected:', seoData.issues);
    }

  }, [location]);

  useEffect(() => {
    // Set up error tracking once
    setupErrorTracking();

    // Set up engagement tracking
    const cleanup = trackUserEngagement();

    return cleanup;
  }, []);

  return null; // This component doesn't render anything
};

export default PerformanceMonitor;
```

```typescript
// Performance monitoring utilities for SEO and user experience

export interface PerformanceMetrics {
  lcp: number; // Largest Contentful Paint
  fid: number; // First Input Delay
  cls: number; // Cumulative Layout Shift
  fcp: number; // First Contentful Paint
  ttfb: number; // Time to First Byte
}

export interface PageLoadMetrics {
  loadTime: number;
  domContentLoaded: number;
  firstPaint: number;
  firstContentfulPaint: number;
}

// Core Web Vitals thresholds
export const PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS = {
  LCP: {
    GOOD: 2500, // ms
    POOR: 4000
  },
  FID: {
    GOOD: 100, // ms
    POOR: 300
  },
  CLS: {
    GOOD: 0.1,
    POOR: 0.25
  },
  FCP: {
    GOOD: 1800, // ms
    POOR: 3000
  },
  TTFB: {
    GOOD: 800, // ms
    POOR: 1800
  }
};

// Monitor page load performance
export const measurePageLoad = (): Promise<PageLoadMetrics> => {
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    if (typeof window === 'undefined') {
      resolve({
        loadTime: 0,
        domContentLoaded: 0,
        firstPaint: 0,
        firstContentfulPaint: 0
      });
      return;
    }

    const observer = new PerformanceObserver((list) => {
      const entries = list.getEntries();
      const navigation = performance.getEntriesByType('navigation')[0] as PerformanceNavigationTiming;
      
      let firstPaint = 0;
      let firstContentfulPaint = 0;

      entries.forEach((entry) => {
        if (entry.name === 'first-paint') {
          firstPaint = entry.startTime;
        }
        if (entry.name === 'first-contentful-paint') {
          firstContentfulPaint = entry.startTime;
        }
      });

      resolve({
        loadTime: navigation.loadEventEnd - navigation.loadEventStart,
        domContentLoaded: navigation.domContentLoadedEventEnd - navigation.domContentLoadedEventStart,
        firstPaint,
        firstContentfulPaint
      });

      observer.disconnect();
    });

    observer.observe({ entryTypes: ['paint', 'navigation'] });
  });
};

// Monitor resource loading
export const measureResourceLoading = () => {
  if (typeof window === 'undefined') return;

  const resources = performance.getEntriesByType('resource');
  const slowResources = resources.filter((resource: any) => resource.duration > 1000);
  
  if (slowResources.length > 0) {
    console.warn('Slow loading resources detected:', slowResources);
    
    // Send to analytics
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('event', 'slow_resources', {
        event_category: 'Performance',
        event_label: 'Resource Loading',
        value: slowResources.length
      });
    }
  }
};

// Monitor JavaScript errors
export const setupErrorTracking = () => {
  if (typeof window === 'undefined') return;

  window.addEventListener('error', (event) => {
    console.error('JavaScript Error:', event.error);
    
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('event', 'javascript_error', {
        event_category: 'Error',
        event_label: event.error?.message || 'Unknown error',
        value: 1
      });
    }
  });

  window.addEventListener('unhandledrejection', (event) => {
    console.error('Unhandled Promise Rejection:', event.reason);
    
    if (window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('event', 'promise_rejection', {
        event_category: 'Error',
        event_label: event.reason?.message || 'Unknown promise rejection',
        value: 1
      });
    }
  });
};

// Monitor user engagement
export const trackUserEngagement = () => {
  if (typeof window === 'undefined') return;

  let startTime = Date.now();
  let isActive = true;

  const trackEngagement = () => {
    if (isActive) {
      const timeSpent = Date.now() - startTime;
      
      if (window.gtag && timeSpent > 5000) { // Only track if user spent more than 5 seconds
        window.gtag('event', 'page_engagement', {
          event_category: 'Engagement',
          event_label: window.location.pathname,
          value: Math.round(timeSpent / 1000) // Convert to seconds
        });
      }
    }
  };

  // Track when user becomes inactive
  const handleVisibilityChange = () => {
    if (document.hidden) {
      isActive = false;
      trackEngagement();
    } else {
      isActive = true;
      startTime = Date.now();
    }
  };

  // Track when user leaves the page
  const handleBeforeUnload = () => {
    trackEngagement();
  };

  document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', handleVisibilityChange);
  window.addEventListener('beforeunload', handleBeforeUnload);

  return () => {
    document.removeEventListener('visibilitychange', handleVisibilityChange);
    window.removeEventListener('beforeunload', handleBeforeUnload);
  };
};

// Generate performance report
export const generatePerformanceReport = async (): Promise<{
  score: number;
  metrics: Partial<PerformanceMetrics>;
  recommendations: string[];
}> => {
  const metrics: Partial<PerformanceMetrics> = {};
  const recommendations: string[] = [];
  let score = 100;

  try {
    // Get Core Web Vitals using web-vitals library
    const webVitals = await import('web-vitals');
    
    return new Promise((resolve) => {
      let metricsCollected = 0;
      const totalMetrics = 5;

      const checkComplete = () => {
        metricsCollected++;
        if (metricsCollected === totalMetrics) {
          // Calculate score based on metrics
          if (metrics.lcp && metrics.lcp > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.LCP.POOR) {
            score -= 20;
            recommendations.push('Optimize Largest Contentful Paint - consider image optimization and server response times');
          }
          if (metrics.fid && metrics.fid > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.FID.POOR) {
            score -= 20;
            recommendations.push('Improve First Input Delay - reduce JavaScript execution time');
          }
          if (metrics.cls && metrics.cls > PERFORMANCE_THRESHOLDS.CLS.POOR) {
            score -= 20;
            recommendations.push('Reduce Cumulative Layout Shift - ensure elements have defined dimensions');
          }

          resolve({ score, metrics, recommendations });
        }
      };

      webVitals.getCLS((metric) => {
        metrics.cls = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
      
      webVitals.getFID((metric) => {
        metrics.fid = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
      
      webVitals.getFCP((metric) => {
        metrics.fcp = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
      
      webVitals.getLCP((metric) => {
        metrics.lcp = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
      
      webVitals.getTTFB((metric) => {
        metrics.ttfb = metric.value;
        checkComplete();
      });
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Failed to generate performance report:', error);
    return { score: 0, metrics: {}, recommendations: ['Performance monitoring is not available'] };
  }
};

// SEO performance monitoring
export const monitorSEOPerformance = () => {
  if (typeof window === 'undefined') return null;

  try {
    // Check if meta tags are present
    const title = document.querySelector('title')?.textContent;
    const description = document.querySelector('meta[name="description"]')?.getAttribute('content');
    const keywords = document.querySelector('meta[name="keywords"]')?.getAttribute('content');
    
    const seoIssues: string[] = [];
    
    if (!title || title.length < 30) {
      seoIssues.push('Page title is missing or too short');
    }
    if (!description || description.length < 120) {
      seoIssues.push('Meta description is missing or too short');
    }
    if (!keywords) {
      seoIssues.push('Meta keywords are missing');
    }

    if (seoIssues.length > 0 && window.gtag) {
      window.gtag('event', 'seo_issues', {
        event_category: 'SEO',
        event_label: seoIssues.join(', '),
        value: seoIssues.length
      });
    }

    return {
      title,
      description,
      keywords,
      issues: seoIssues
    };
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error monitoring SEO performance:', error);
    return null;
  }
};
```

```typescriptreact
                  <User className="h-5 w-5 text-blue-600" />
                  <span className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-800">{user.full_name}</span>

                <button
                  onClick={logout}
                  className="flex items-center space-x-1 bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 to-pink-500 text-white px-3 py-2 rounded-lg hover:from-red-600 hover:to-pink-600 transition-all duration-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md"
                >
                  <LogOut className="h-4 w-4" />
                  <span className="font-medium">Logout</span>
                </button>
              </div>
            ) : (
              <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
                <Link to="/login" className="btn-primary">
                  Login
                </Link>
              </div>
            )}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </nav>
  );
};

export default Navbar;
```

```typescript
import axios from 'axios';
import { AuthResponse, LoginRequest, RegisterRequest, User, Course, CourseFilters, Enrollment, AdminStats } from '../types';

// Use proxy in development, direct URL in production
const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || (
  process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' ? '/api' : 'http://localhost:8000/api'
);

// Create axios instance
const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Add token to requests
api.interceptors.request.use((config) => {
  const token = localStorage.getItem('access_token');
  if (token) {
    config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
  }
  return config;
});

// Handle token expiration and network errors
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    console.error('API Error:', error);
    
    // Handle network errors (when there's no response)
    if (!error.response) {
      error.message = 'Network Error';
      error.code = 'NETWORK_ERROR';
      console.error('Network error - cannot connect to server:', error.message);
    }
    
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      // Check if we're already on the login page to avoid infinite redirects
      const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
      if (currentPath !== '/login') {
        console.log('Authentication failed - redirecting to login');
        localStorage.removeItem('access_token');
        localStorage.removeItem('user');
        
        // Use React Router navigation instead of hard redirect when possible
        // This preserves app state and provides better UX
        if (window.history) {
          window.history.pushState({}, '', '/login');
          window.location.reload();
        } else {
          window.location.href = '/login';
        }
      }
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Authentication Services
export const authService = {
  async login(credentials: LoginRequest): Promise<AuthResponse> {
    const formData = new FormData();
    formData.append('username', credentials.email); // OAuth2 expects 'username' field, but we pass email
    formData.append('password', credentials.password);
    
    const response = await api.post('/auth/login', formData, {
      headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' },
    });
    
    if (response.data.access_token) {
      localStorage.setItem('access_token', response.data.access_token);
    }
    
    return response.data;
  },


  async getCurrentUser(): Promise<User> {
    const response = await api.get('/auth/me');
    return response.data;
  },

  logout() {
    localStorage.removeItem('access_token');
    localStorage.removeItem('user');
    window.location.href = '/login';
  },

  async changePassword(data: { current_password: string; new_password: string }): Promise<void> {
    await api.post('/auth/change-password', data);
  },

  async checkPasswordStrength(password: string): Promise<any> {
    const response = await api.post('/auth/check-password-strength', { password });
    return response.data;
  },

  async getPasswordPolicy(): Promise<any> {
    const response = await api.get('/auth/password-policy');
    return response.data;
  },

  // Check if token is about to expire (within 5 minutes)
  isTokenExpiringSoon(): boolean {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('access_token');
    if (!token) {
      return false;
    }
    
    try {
      // Decode JWT token to check expiration
      const payload = JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1]));
      const exp = payload.exp * 1000; // Convert to milliseconds
      const now = Date.now();
      const fiveMinutes = 5 * 60 * 1000;
      
      return (exp - now) < fiveMinutes;
    } catch {
      return true; // If we can't decode, assume it needs refresh
    }
  },

  // Get token expiration time
  getTokenExpirationTime(): Date | null {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('access_token');
    if (!token) {
      return null;
    }
    
    try {
      const payload = JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1]));
      return new Date(payload.exp * 1000);
    } catch {
      return null;
    }
  },
};

    const response = await api.get(`/courses?${params.toString()}`);
    return response.data;

export const testConnection = async () => {
  try {
    console.log('Testing connection to backend...');
    console.log('API Base URL:', API_BASE_URL);
    console.log('Current token:', localStorage.getItem('access_token') ? 'Present' : 'Missing');
    
    // Test 1: Simple health check (remove /api suffix for root endpoint)
    const healthUrl = API_BASE_URL.replace('/api', '') || '/';
    const healthResponse = await axios.get(healthUrl, { timeout: 5000 });
    console.log('✅ Health check successful:', healthResponse.status);
    
    // Test 2: Try authenticated API call
    try {
      const authResponse = await api.get('/admin/users');
      console.log('✅ Authenticated API test successful');
      return { success: true, status: healthResponse.status, authenticated: true };
    } catch (authError: any) {
      console.log('⚠️  Authentication test failed:', authError.response?.status);
      if (authError.response?.status === 401) {
        return { 
          success: false, 
          error: 'Authentication failed - token expired. Please login again.', 
          code: 'AUTH_ERROR',
          needsLogin: true
        };
      }
      return { success: true, status: healthResponse.status, authenticated: false };
    }
  } catch (error: any) {
    console.error('Connection test failed:', error);
    return { 
      success: false, 
      error: `Cannot connect to backend: ${error.message}`, 
      code: error.code || 'NETWORK_ERROR' 
    };
  }
};
```

```typescript
    // Handle network errors (when there's no response)
    if (!error.response) {
      error.message = 'Network Error';
      error.code = 'NETWORK_ERROR';
      console.error('Network error - cannot connect to server:', error.message);
    }
    
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      // Check if we're already on the login page to avoid infinite redirects
      const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
      if (currentPath !== '/login') {
        console.log('Authentication failed - redirecting to login');
        localStorage.removeItem('access_token');
        localStorage.removeItem('user');
        
        // Use React Router navigation instead of hard redirect when possible
        // This preserves app state and provides better UX
        if (window.history) {
          window.history.pushState({}, '', '/login');
          window.location.reload();
        } else {
          window.location.href = '/login';
        }
      }
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Authentication Services
export const authService = {
  async login(credentials: LoginRequest): Promise<AuthResponse> {
    const formData = new FormData();
    formData.append('username', credentials.email); // OAuth2 expects 'username' field, but we pass email
    formData.append('password', credentials.password);
    
    const response = await api.post('/auth/login', formData, {
      headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' },
    });
    
    if (response.data.access_token) {
      localStorage.setItem('access_token', response.data.access_token);
    }
    
    return response.data;
  },


  async getCurrentUser(): Promise<User> {
    const response = await api.get('/auth/me');
    return response.data;
  },

  logout() {
    localStorage.removeItem('access_token');
    localStorage.removeItem('user');
    window.location.href = '/login';
  },

  async changePassword(data: { current_password: string; new_password: string }): Promise<void> {
    await api.post('/auth/change-password', data);
  },

  async checkPasswordStrength(password: string): Promise<any> {
    const response = await api.post('/auth/check-password-strength', { password });
    return response.data;
  },

  async getPasswordPolicy(): Promise<any> {
    const response = await api.get('/auth/password-policy');
    return response.data;
  },

  // Check if token is about to expire (within 5 minutes)
  isTokenExpiringSoon(): boolean {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('access_token');
    if (!token) {
      return false;
    }
    
    try {
      // Decode JWT token to check expiration
      const payload = JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1]));
      const exp = payload.exp * 1000; // Convert to milliseconds
      const now = Date.now();
      const fiveMinutes = 5 * 60 * 1000;
      
      return (exp - now) < fiveMinutes;
    } catch {
      return true; // If we can't decode, assume it needs refresh
    }
  },

  // Get token expiration time
  getTokenExpirationTime(): Date | null {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('access_token');
    if (!token) {
      return null;
    }
    
    try {
      const payload = JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1]));
      return new Date(payload.exp * 1000);
    } catch {
      return null;
    }
  },
};
```
